pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid (2016, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Lazer X's $(l:ex_aid/devices/gashacon_bugvisor_ii_lazer)Gashacon Bugvisor II (Lazer)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Lazer's $(l:ex_aid/riders/lazer#chambara)Chambara Gamer$(/l)
